content.raw: I'm trying to decide if this is potentially unsafe, but I can't quite reason through it.  I think making these `static` rather than using a singleton may put us at risk of the “static initialization order fiasco” \([https://isocpp.org/wiki/faq/ctors#static-init-order](https://isocpp.org/wiki/faq/ctors#static-init-order)\), but I’m not positive.  Is there a reason that you didn’t use the singleton here?
